title: What are the best custom playlists on Spotify? - Quora

response.answer_text: As soon as you open Spotify on your PC; on the down-left corner, you will find an option of new playlist you can create your custom playlist by adding your faviorite songs REGARDS, Samidha IX St. PaulsHigh School

This is my most popular playlist: The Rhythm Is Gonna Get You, a playlist by almightylord565 on Spotify  At 126 followers, and it is surely groovy, it is one of the best And I’m a normal person. Or I might be less than normal. By no means am I famous. This playlist is the most critically-acclaimed in my family:  끝 Ian
